title: What Does the ðŸ˜‡ Angel Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji means someone is showing goodwill and kindness.
steps.content: The ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji means someone is showing goodwill and kindness. When used sincerely, this emoji is used to describe someone else's good deeds or helpful actions. You can also use it to describe your own behavior. In this case, it might be used in a joking , self-congratulatory manner. [1] X Research source "Thank you so much for letting me borrow your notes! You're the best. ðŸ˜‡" "Just asked my roommate to do her dishes without losing my temper. I deserve an award! ðŸ˜‡"

steps.title: The ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji may mean someone is flirting with you.
steps.content: The ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji may mean someone is flirting with you. If someone is hitting on you on Snapchat or texting you flirty messages, they may add this emoji to show how sweet and angelic they find you. Alternatively, they may use the emoji to playfully deny their message's more suggestive meaning. [2] X Research source "You're so pretty. You've got such a sweet smile. ðŸ˜‡" "You're too cute. Can't stop thinking about you. ðŸ˜‡ðŸ˜‰"

steps.title: The ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji represents angels and blessings.
steps.content: The ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji represents angels and blessings. [3] X Research source The emoji can also be used in a more literal sense. If someone is talking about angels or feeling blessed, they may add this emoji for extra emphasis. [4] X Research source "I had a dream an angel visited me! Do you think it means anything? ðŸ˜‡" "I'm so blessed to have such incredible friends and family. ðŸ˜‡"

steps.title: Use the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji when someone does a good deed.
steps.content: Use the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji when someone does a good deed. If a friend helps you out or does something kind, praise their efforts with this emoji. [5] X Research source "Thank you so much for your helpful advice today. You're an angel ðŸ˜‡." "I can't thank you enough for babysitting tonight! ðŸ˜‡"

steps.title: Opt for the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji to congratulate yourself for good behavior.
steps.content: Opt for the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji to congratulate yourself for good behavior. Next time you want to (jokingly) boast about your own amazing deeds, throw in this emoji to make your message a little more playful. [6] X Research source "Got through family dinner with no arguments tonight. ðŸ˜‡" "Gave my friend a ride to the airport without complaining once! ðŸ˜‡"

steps.title: Choose the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji when you're flirting.
steps.content: Choose the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji when you're flirting . If you really like someone, add in this emoji to show how much you appreciate their amazing, angel-like qualities. The emoji can also work if you're in the mood for something a little more risque. In that case, throw in the angel emoji to playfully deny your message's suggestive meaning. "You're such a good guy. Handsome, too. ðŸ˜‡" "Haven't been able to stop thinking about last night...ðŸ˜‡ðŸ˜ˆ"

steps.title: Go for the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji anytime you're talking about angels.
steps.content: Go for the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji anytime you're talking about angels. When the subject of angels, cherubs, or blessings comes up, use this emoji to complete your message. [7] X Research source "I've always loved paintings of angels. So pretty! ðŸ˜‡" "I think I might be an angel for Halloween. ðŸ˜‡"

steps.title: Thank the person if they're praising your good behavior.
steps.content: Thank the person if they're praising your good behavior. Whenever someone pays you a compliment like this, go ahead and let them know that their words mean a lot to you. Them: "You're the best for helping me study for this exam! ðŸ˜‡" You: "Aw, thanks. I'm happy to help!"

steps.title: Congratulate your friend for their good deeds.
steps.content: Congratulate your friend for their good deeds. If a friend messaged you to share something angelic they did themselves, praise them for it (even if they're just joking). Them: "I'm in a bad mood and am still being so nice to customers. ðŸ˜‡" You: "Wow, that takes skill!"

steps.title: Send a flirty message in return.
steps.content: Send a flirty message in return. When someone is flirting with you on Snapchat or sending you suggestive text messages, go ahead and flirt back if you're into it. [8] X Research source Them: "You're so beautiful. ðŸ˜‡" You: "You're pretty gorgeous yourself. ðŸ˜Œ"

steps.title: Show interest in the person's angelic conversation topic.
steps.content: Show interest in the person's angelic conversation topic. If someone brings up angels, cherubs, or blessings, show your enthusiasm about the subject or ask a question to learn more. Them: "I just read this really interesting book about angels. ðŸ˜‡" You: "Oh cool! What's it called?"

steps.title: If you like the angel emoji, there's one more to choose from.
steps.content: If you like the angel emoji, there's one more to choose from. Use the ðŸ‘¼ (baby angel) emoji in a similar fashion as the ðŸ˜‡ (angel) emoji. It's a great option when you're referring to good deeds, innocence, or anything related to cherubs or angels. The ðŸ‘¼ (baby angel) is sometimes referred to as the cherub.
